thread.title: U.S. stocks end slightly lower; IBM weighs on Dow - MarketWatch
thread.title_full: U.S. stocks end slightly lower; IBM weighs on Dow - MarketWatch

author: Anora Mahmudova
title: U.S. stocks end slightly lower; IBM weighs on Dow - MarketWatch
text: U.S. stocks closed slightly lower on Tuesday as investors grappled with mixed earnings reports, while a selloff in the health-care sector weighed on Nasdaq. The S&P 500 SPX, -0.14% closed 2.89 points, or 0.1%, lower at 2,030.77. The Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, -0.08% fell 13.43 points, or 0.1%, to 17,217.11. The Nasdaq Composite COMP, -0.50% ended the day down 24.50 points, or 0.5%, at 4,880.97.
